game.name: PlayAbility Adaptive Software
game.categories: 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 텍스트 크기 조절, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션
game.shortDescription: Free adaptive gaming software that uses your webcam and microphone to turn face gestures, head movements, and voice commands into in-game controls – play any game your way
game.shortDescriptionEn: Free adaptive gaming software that uses your webcam and microphone to turn face gestures, head movements, and voice commands into in-game controls – play any game your way
